title: Jacob's Ladder
description: A man on a mission…  Jake can see the future and there’s a special woman on his mind. She needs his help and he’s just the man to help when danger stalks her every step.  A woman with responsibilities…  For Ria, being the Nyx—the leader of her people—comes with burdens that few can understand. Her special abilities make her a target of the Venifucus, an ancient faction that hopes to pervert Ria’s hereditary power to their own evil purposes. She’s lived her life on the run, but the time has come to turn and confront the bad guys on her trail.  Can they stop the Venifucus from using the ancient power of the Nyx to return evil to this world? Whatever the cost, they must stop it, before it’s too late.
author: Bianca D'Arc
